main.description: Delete a registered device and all its associated key packages. Users can only delete their own devices.

deviceId.description: Device ID to delete (must be owned by authenticated user)

deleted.description: True if device was successfully deleted

keyPackagesDeleted.description: Number of key packages deleted with the device

errors.name: DeviceNotFound
errors.description: The specified device does not exist

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.description: User does not own this device or is not authenticated
